param.name: file_id
param.doc: ID of the relevant log file.

method.name: GET
method.doc: To export a common log file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export request parameter on the common log files resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. If the export parameter is included in the URL, the entire file is exported. If no export parameter is included in the URL, a snippet of the file is retrieved.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
